aws_account_id          = "999999999999"
aws_access_key_id       = "999999999999"
aws_secret_access_key   = "999999999999"
domain                  = "sdp-dev"
user_groups             = {
    "admin" = "The admin users for the Digital Landscape"
    "reviewer" = "The reviewer users for the Digital Landscape"
}
token_validity_values   = {
    refresh_token = 30  # 30 days
    access_token  = 3   # 3 hours
    id_token      = 3   # 3 hours
}
sign_out_urls           = [
    "<service_url>"
]
